body: 無戲份的主人公欸 草

Why is the demon girl fat? We have enough overweight characters in the west, we don't need it infecting the east to satisfy people who aren't customers and hate themselves anyway.

The Art isn't great but the angles and presentation aren't half bad. And while it's untranslated, what I can tell of the story isn't so bad. I'd recommend since the fat girl isn't hideously obese, and can add to the evil corruption angle, though it does ruin it for me.
